INTERESTS
Why they want to be a part of this program:
	* I love teaching and I love teaching in ways that are engaging and fun for the kids. I also love learning and furthering my knowledge. I always look for ways to work here and there over the summer because I don't like to just sit around and this sounds like something I would really enjoy.
